dt: {bc}a mineral or rock consisting essentially of a hydrous magnesium silicate usually having a dull green color and often a mottled appearance

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}serpentin{/it}, Medieval Latin {it}serpentina, serpentinum{/it}, from Late Latin, feminine & neuter of {it}serpentinus{/it} resembling a serpent
shortdef: a mineral or rock consisting essentially of a hydrous magnesium silicate usually having a dull green color and often a mottled appearance
